amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $4,751,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by 4,751,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 256 (Roll no. 317).
